trans-unit.source: Provides functionality for resolving a coordinate-based location to a civic address.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce la funzionalità per la risoluzione di un percorso basato sulle coordinate in un indirizzo civico.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Device.Location.CivicAddressResolver> class provides an implementation of <xref:System.Device.Location.ICivicAddressResolver> that resolves a coordinate-based location to a civic address if the location provider provides both coordinates and civic address data.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Device.Location.CivicAddressResolver> classe fornisce un'implementazione di <xref:System.Device.Location.ICivicAddressResolver> che risolve un percorso basato su coordinate a un indirizzo civico se il provider di percorso fornisce sia coordinate sia dati civico.

trans-unit.source: The following program shows how to call <xref:System.Device.Location.CivicAddressResolver.ResolveAddress%2A> to resolve a civic address synchronously.
trans-unit.target: Il programma seguente viene illustrato come chiamare <xref:System.Device.Location.CivicAddressResolver.ResolveAddress%2A> per risolvere un indirizzo civico in modo sincrono.

trans-unit.source: The following program shows how to call <xref:System.Device.Location.CivicAddressResolver.ResolveAddressAsync%2A> to resolve a civic address asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: Il programma seguente viene illustrato come chiamare <xref:System.Device.Location.CivicAddressResolver.ResolveAddressAsync%2A> per risolvere un indirizzo civico in modo asincrono.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.CivicAddressResolver" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.CivicAddressResolver" />.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Device.Location.CivicAddressResolver> class.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene illustrato come inizializzare una nuova istanza della classe <xref:System.Device.Location.CivicAddressResolver>.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate" /> containing the location to resolve to a civic address.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate" /> contenente la posizione da risolvere in un indirizzo civico.

trans-unit.source: Synchronously resolves a civic address from a location based on latitude and longitude.
trans-unit.target: Risolve in modo sincrono un indirizzo civico da un percorso basato sulla latitudine e la longitudine.

trans-unit.source: This call will block execution of the calling thread while the address is being resolved.
trans-unit.target: La chiamata non bloccherà l'esecuzione del thread chiamante mentre viene risolto l'indirizzo.

trans-unit.source: The civic address that is resolved from the <paramref name="coordinate" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: Indirizzo civico risolto dal parametro <paramref name="coordinate" />.

trans-unit.source: <see cref="F:System.Device.Location.CivicAddress.Unknown" /> is returned if the address cannot be resolved.
trans-unit.target: Se non è possibile risolvere l'indirizzo viene restituito <see cref="F:System.Device.Location.CivicAddress.Unknown" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Device.Location.ICivicAddressResolver.ResolveAddressCompleted> event is raised when the address resolve operation completes.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Device.Location.ICivicAddressResolver.ResolveAddressCompleted> evento viene generato al completamento dell'operazione di risoluzione di indirizzo.

trans-unit.source: The civic address that is resolved from the `coordinate` parameter is returned by the <xref:System.Device.Location.ResolveAddressCompletedEventArgs.Address%2A> member of the <xref:System.Device.Location.ResolveAddressCompletedEventArgs> object that is passed to the event handler.
trans-unit.target: Indirizzo civico risolto dal `coordinate` restituito dal parametro di <xref:System.Device.Location.ResolveAddressCompletedEventArgs.Address%2A> membro del <xref:System.Device.Location.ResolveAddressCompletedEventArgs> oggetto passato al gestore dell'evento.

trans-unit.source: The following program demonstrates how to call <xref:System.Device.Location.CivicAddressResolver.ResolveAddress%2A> to resolve a civic address synchronously.
trans-unit.target: Il programma seguente viene illustrato come chiamare <xref:System.Device.Location.CivicAddressResolver.ResolveAddress%2A> per risolvere un indirizzo civico in modo sincrono.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="coordinate" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="coordinate" /> è <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="coordinate" /> does not contain a valid latitude and longitude.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="coordinate" /> non contiene valori validi di latitudine e longitudine.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate" /> containing the location to resolve to a civic address.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate" /> contenente la posizione da risolvere in un indirizzo civico.

trans-unit.source: Resolves an address asynchronously from a location that is based on latitude and longitude.
trans-unit.target: Risolve un indirizzo in modo asincrono da una posizione basata su latitudine e longitudine.

trans-unit.source: The call does not block execution of the calling thread while the address is being resolved.
trans-unit.target: La chiamata non blocca l'esecuzione del thread chiamante mentre l'indirizzo viene risolto.

trans-unit.source: The following program shows how to call <xref:System.Device.Location.CivicAddressResolver.ResolveAddressAsync%2A> to resolve a civic address asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: Il programma seguente viene illustrato come chiamare <xref:System.Device.Location.CivicAddressResolver.ResolveAddressAsync%2A> per risolvere un indirizzo civico in modo asincrono.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="coordinate" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="coordinate" /> è <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="coordinate" /> does not contain a valid latitude and longitude.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="coordinate" /> non contiene valori validi di latitudine e longitudine.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the address resolution that was initiated by a call to <see cref="M:System.Device.Location.CivicAddressResolver.ResolveAddressAsync(System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate)" /> completes.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando la risoluzione dell'indirizzo iniziata da una chiamata a <see cref="M:System.Device.Location.CivicAddressResolver.ResolveAddressAsync(System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate)" /> viene completata.

trans-unit.source: The following program shows how to call <xref:System.Device.Location.CivicAddressResolver.ResolveAddressAsync%2A> to resolve a civic address asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: Il programma seguente viene illustrato come chiamare <xref:System.Device.Location.CivicAddressResolver.ResolveAddressAsync%2A> per risolvere un indirizzo civico in modo asincrono.
